name: Squamp
description:
SQUAMP is a simple, fast-paced arcade platformer.

Take control of a tiny red square, dodge the bullets as long as possible and collect gems to reach the Highscore!

Includes a version playable from the browser, as well as one downloadable for Windows.

This is my first game I ever made, but I'm working hard on trying to make it as good as possible. Updates should be frequent but (kind of) inconsistent,  and constructive criticism is always welcome!
